mapper.insert: insert into board_study ( seq ,mem_name ,mem_id ,board_subject ,board_content ,reg_date ,view_cnt) values ( (select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from board_study) ,#{memName} ,#{memId} ,#{boardSubject} ,#{boardContent} ,sysdate ,'0')
mapper.select: select seq ,mem_name ,mem_id ,board_subject ,board_content ,reg_date ,upt_date ,view_cnt from board_study where seq = #{sub}

select seq ,mem_name ,mem_id ,board_subject ,board_content ,reg_date ,upt_date ,view_cnt from board_study where
mem_name like '%'||#{textbar}||'%' or board_subject like '%'||#{textbar}||'%' or board_content like '%'||#{textbar}||'%'
mem_name like '%'||#{textbar}||'%'
board_subject like '%'||#{textbar}||'%'
board_subject like '%'||#{textbar}||'%' or board_content like '%'||#{textbar}||'%'

select seq ,mem_name ,mem_id ,board_subject ,board_content ,reg_date ,upt_date ,view_cnt from (select rownum rnm ,seq ,mem_name ,mem_id ,board_subject ,board_content ,reg_date ,upt_date ,view_cnt from (select seq ,mem_name ,mem_id ,board_subject ,board_content ,reg_date ,upt_date ,view_cnt from board_study order by seq desc)) where 1=1
and rnm >= (${firstPage}-1)*${limit}+1 and rnm <= ${firstPage}*${limit}
and (mem_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or board_subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or board_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') and reg_date between to_date(#{datepicker}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{datepicker1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and mem_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and reg_date between to_date(#{datepicker}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{datepicker1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and board_subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and reg_date between to_date(#{datepicker}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{datepicker1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and (board_subject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or board_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') and reg_date between to_date(#{datepicker}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{datepicker1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and rnm >= ${firstPage} and rnm <= ${limit}
